articles.author: Sunaadh Sagar
articles.title: Explainer: Why are the Indian football teams not part of Asian Games? - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: With only 10 days to go until the football draw for Asian Games, India's respective sporting authorities will have to make a quick decision.
articles.content: The 2023 Asian Games in Hangzhou will (probably) not include the Indian football teams, after the Indian Olympic Association (IOA) opted against sending a team. The reason - failure to meet Sports Mi… [+7019 chars]
